Read More About Kosha's Women's Winter Thermals

SHOP WINTER WEAR ONLINE FOR WOMEN WITH KOSHA:

A woman’s ultimate go-to winter & travel wear solution. Kosha's collection of online women’s winter wear is designed with technical features without compromising on the quality. All this while enhancing comfort and performance during travel. The designs are available in sizes XS to 3XL, and we also provide plus-size winter wear. Kosha’s collections are designed and manufactured in India, with the facility to ship internationally and free shipping within India. Our range includes lightweight women's thermals and breathable thermal wear for women, ensuring comfort across various climates.

TRADITIONAL THERMAL WEAR FOR WINTER FOR LADIES REINVENTED BY KOSHA:

Partner with the best thermal wear brand in India to find the answers to questions like what to wear in winter while running, skiing, and what to wear underneath a Parka Jacket. Kosha travel wear is known for its base layer thermals, which are made of Merino Wool and Bamboo Fiber as a blend. Our Women's Thermal Wear is 100% eco-friendly and skin-friendly. Thermal sets for ladies are made from a soft new age nanotech fiber, unlike old school itchy wool, and can be worn as winter innerwear in extremely cold weather. We offer both full sleeve thermal tops for women and thermal leggings for women to provide optimum warmth and comfort. These are durable, odour-free, and have advanced moisture-wicking properties!

FEATURES OF MERINO WOOL THERMALS :

Our collection of women’s thermal wear is suitable for a temperature range of -20°C to 15°C. The material is soft and lightweight, making it an ideal choice for lightweight women's thermals to keep you warm and fresh. Some highlighted properties include:

  • Softness: Merino wool proves to be delightfully soft due to its fineness. It ranges from 14.5 to 23.5 micrometers, while a human hair is 30 micrometers thick! It doesn’t require any softener as it is 3 times softer than natural silk. Merino wool is the most preferred itch-free fabric to stay warm in.
  • Elasticity: Merino wool fabrics let the body move freely thanks to their molecular structure. The fiber may be safely stretched from 25 to 30% of its natural length. It will regain its original shape after stretching up to 50% of its length when wet!
  • Less damp, fresh for longer: Merino is known for its moisture-wicking quality and can soak up to 30% of its weight before feeling wet because of the fiber scale structure. Our merino thermals wick the moisture away from the skin into the atmosphere, keeping you dry for a longer period of time.
  • Odour resistant: The lanolin in merino wool prevents mildew and bacteria from building up on the clothing, thus odour molecules are absorbed into the merino fiber, making it odour resistant. Merino Wool fibers naturally have antibacterial, antimicrobial properties and are hypoallergenic in nature.
  • Merino is a 100% natural resource. It is also biodegradable, organic, and environmentally friendly.

WHAT MAKES OUR THERMAL WEAR SPECIAL?

Kosha has now made it possible to blend merino wool fibers with bamboo fabric, made from the pulp of bamboo plants, which are the fastest-growing grass species in the world. Bamboo fiber is soft and comfortable against the skin, as it is naturally smooth and round even without any chemical treatment. It has no sharp spurs to scratch against the skin, is a highly absorbent material, has quick-drying properties, and people who are allergic to other natural fibers like wool or hemp will usually experience no allergic reactions from wearing clothes made of bamboo fibers, prompting us to blend with merino wool for best user experience!

LEARN HOW TO LAYER YOURSELF IN WINTER WITH KOSHA :

Kosha designs and collections keep the winter layering system and the traveller’s comfort at the heart of their products. Kit yourself from head to toe in one place and travel hassle-free. Usually, all layers purchased from any other travel wear company would amount to INR 50,000+. Kosha offers a bundle of all layers for INR 15,000. This also makes Kosha the right choice for those planning to immigrate to Canada, Finland, the United Kingdom, Germany, Australia, or shift base to colder regions. Options include women’s sweaters, women’s winter accessories, cotton sweaters, Merino Wool Thermals for Women, Bamboo Thermal Clothing for Women, technical socks, snow-proof pants, waterproof jackets, touch-enabled gloves, beanies, mufflers, and much more. Learn about the special layering needs for Mount Everest, Chadar Trek, Switzerland, and more at Kosha Journals. Shop your layering needs online at www.kosha.co

LIFETIME REPAIRS FOR KOSHA PRODUCTS:

Indian travellers are adventurous and are experimenting with off-beat holiday destinations and sports. For this, they need a brand that’s accessible, fashionable, and easy to maintain. Kosha fulfills all those requirements. We offer a lifetime free repair service to all our customers, irrespective of when they bought the product. To reduce wastage and excessive consumption, we have set up a facility in-house where you can bring back worn garments for lifetime repair. If it is worn beyond repair, we will recycle the garment for you.

SLOW TRAVEL AND SUSTAINABLE CHOICES:

Kosha is a pro-nature winter-wear and travel-wear brand that was launched in June 2017 to cater to the traveler who is conscious of the environment. We believe in immersive yet empathetic travel. We create thoughtful travel wear that is animal-friendly, responsibly sourced & designed to last. We have even opted for biodegradable packages and fabric e-commerce packaging to reduce the carbon footprint of our products. With each new quarter, we look at new ways to improve our products.

TRAVEL THE WORLD WITH KOSHA - SHARE YOUR #KOSHASTORY:

Kosha’s layers for winter, insulated jackets have given travellers a beautiful experience watching the Northern Lights without a worry about the cold. Parkas for Finland, Sweaters for Poland, Trench Coats for Germany, Waterproof Jacket for London, Thermals & Kosha Base Layers for Canada, Merino Wool Socks for Switzerland. Students going to study in New York, Chicago, London, Australia, pursue medicine in Russia. Outdoor enthusiasts and adventure lovers go for the Chadar Trek, Kedarkantha Trek, Roopkund Trek, Everest Base Camp, Valley of Flowers Trek, Great Lakes Trek, Alps, Himalayas. Explorers travelling for holiday or newlyweds going for their honeymoon to Gulmarg, Jungfrau, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, Iceland, Scotland, Aurora Borealis. Get pro tips and special guides on what to wear in Kosha Journals.

BECOME A KOSHA COLLABORATOR: Kosha is always on the lookout for like-minded brands and individuals to collaborate with. Email us at konnect@kosha.co or get in touch with us on our Instagram, Facebook, or LinkedIn to get the conversation started.

BECOME A KOSHA TESTER:

An essential part of the Kosha Design process is research and development. We are always tinkering and experimenting with new ways to make more travel-friendly and sustainable products with new features and more comfort. For the BETA and sampling phase, we sometimes need to test out the products and share real-time feedback on the performance of our garments. If this sounds like something you would like to do, email us at konnect@kosha.co

PARTNER WITH KOSHA FOR CORPORATE ORDERS:

At Kosha, we are happy to incorporate your company's identity on garments purchased in bulk as well. If you wish to place such an order, email our team at konnect@kosha.co

SPECIAL STUDENT DISCOUNT:

We offer a special student discount for those travelling overseas to study. Shop online at https://kosha.co/ and contact us on our helpline or email for further details. Our special lightweight puffer jackets, Kosha Base Layers, Multipurpose Winter Jackets, Smart Parkas, Trendy Accessories, Touch-Enabled Gloves, and more will set you up for success.

KOSHA HELPLINE AND CUSTOMER CARE:

Call us on our helpline (+91 9820999006) for any help on the layers you need based on the place and time of travel. The Kosha Helpline timings are between 10:30 am to 8:30 pm Mondays to Saturdays & 12 noon to 8:30 pm on Sundays. We are happy to help with queries on product features, size guides, fit and finish, materials used, delivery, and more. You can also email our team at konnect@kosha.co for any order-related assistance.

CONNECT WITH KOSHA: Find us on Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn
